title: Richmond National Battlefield Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      There are no entrance fees to Richmond National Battlefield Park sites.  However there is a parking fee for the American Civil War Center at Tredegar Iron Works.  Free parking is available nearby.The Interagency Annual Pass, Senior Pass and Access Pass can be obtained at the Civil War Visitor Center at Tredegar Iron Works (cash or check only.)
